row.name: UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL#
row.xui: <integer alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVLs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="Connection Interval" tooltip="Time interval in seconds during which ARATools.jar tries to establish a connection to the database."> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry> <entry name="text">Connection Interval</entry> <entry name="min"/> <entry name="max"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVLs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Time interval in seconds during which ARATools.jar tries to establish a connection to the database.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue">0</entry> </properties> </integer>

row.name: UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRY#
row.xui: <integer alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRYs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="Number of Connection Retries" tooltip="The number that is specified in this parameter determines how often ARATools.jar tries to connect to the database. After the nth failure, the ARATools ends with a failure code."> <properties> <entry listparam="N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry> <entry name="text">Number of Connection Retries</entry> <entry name="min"/> <entry name="max"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRYs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">The number that is specified in this parameter determines how often ARATools.jar tries to connect to the database. After the nth failure, the ARATools ends with a failure code.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue">0</entry> </properties> </integer>
